QuestData.Title: A Way Home
QuestData.Description:
We can harness the power within this place to open a portal home.
I will require your assistance. Isn't this fun? You get to be my assistant!
Ah, yes. Just come with me and all you have to do is wave that Heart of Azeroth of yours around. I'll handle the rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Oculeth open a portal to Zuldazar.
